alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 9:51AM CST until January 12 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CST FOR EASTERN NOXUBEE AND KEMPER COUNTIES... At 951 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Prairie Point to near Shuqualak to near De Kalb, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... De Kalb, Scooba, Prairie Point, and Paulette around 955 AM CST. Cooksville and Electric Mills around 1000 AM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
